name: Floppy Fish (ScottSteer)
description:
Floppy Fish!

 A flappy bird style game where you have to dodge tubes that move both horizontally and vertically!

Tubes can also spawn in at angles so beware!

Controls: Click or Press Space to Jump.

Play in browser or download for windows.

This game was initially a mechanical demo that I created for a university project, and decided to complete.
